The {{tt|std::chrono::duration_values}} type defines three common durations:

* {{c|std::chrono::duration_values::zero}}
* {{c|std::chrono::duration_values::min}}
* {{c|std::chrono::duration_values::max}}

The [[cpp/chrono/duration/zero|zero]], [[cpp/chrono/duration/min|min]], and [[cpp/chrono/duration/max|max]] static member functions in {{lc|std::chrono::duration}} forward their work to these functions.

This type can be specialized if the representation {{tt|Rep}} requires a specific implementation to return these duration objects.
